name: Simon-Kucher & Partners
tagline: World's leading pricing and commercial growth specialist
description: Simon-Kucher is a global consultancy with more than 2,000 employees in 30+ countries. Our sole focus is on unlocking better growth that drives measurable revenue and profit for our clients. We achieve this by optimizing every lever of their commercial strategy – product, price, innovation, marketing, and sales – based on deep insights into what customers want and value. With nearly 40 years of experience in monetization topics of all kinds, we are regarded as the world's leading pricing and growth specialist. known_for: Founded in 1985 as a university spinoff, Simon-Kucher pioneered the field of pricing strategy and has become the world's leading pricing and growth specialist. The firm claims projects increase client profitability by 100-500 basis points on average. Unlike generalist consultancies, Simon-Kucher focuses exclusively on commercial growth—optimizing product, price, innovation, marketing, and sales with scientific rigor.
career_path: Consultant (1.5-2 yrs) → Senior Consultant (1.5-2 yrs) → Manager (2 yrs) → Director (2-3 yrs) → Partner

recruiting.process: Application → First Round (2 interviews: case + fit) → Final Round (3 interviews: case + fit)
recruiting.unique: Strong emphasis on pricing cases reflecting firm's specialization; candidate-led format; cases focus on monetization, revenue growth, and sales excellence rather than pure strategy
recruiting.timeline: Approximately 26 days from application to offer; 3-4 rounds total combining behavioral, quantitative, and case interviews

byu.tip: Very limited BYU presence (only 1 current alum). Focus on cold networking through LinkedIn and target partners/managers in Boston, New York, or San Francisco offices. Emphasize quantitative skills and pricing/revenue optimization interests.
